text: Matt Duffer and Ross Duffer (born February 15, 1984), better known as The Duffer Brothers, are American writers, directors and producers of movies and television. They are best known for creating the Netflix science fiction/horror series Stranger Things (2016–present). They wrote and directed the movie Hidden (2015). The Duffers also wrote episodes of the Fox series Wayward Pines (2015–2016). The Duffers were born in Durham, North Carolina. They are twin brothers. They moved to California in 2007. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Durham, North Carolina Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Twin people from the United States Category:Writers from North Carolina Category:Sibling duos
title: Duffer Brothers
